home.title2: of trust and peace of mind
home.subTitle: We want to leave a blue planet for our future children. That is our wish.

buy.title: Purchase support
buy.subTitle: We can handle anything that is cycleable. Please feel free to contact us.

greetings.title: Greeting
greetings.subTitle: To Create Comfortable Society and Revitalize Communities
greetings.content:
By reducing waste through non-ferrous metal recycling,we are contributing to the global environment protection,as a company with the advantages for both clients who remove waste and who need resources
We will continue to work together as one,striving to be a company loved by clients and communities
We will greatly appreciate our supporter

buy.title: buy
buy.content: We are based in Chiba City and handing different types of scrap like iron and metal,home appliances and batteries. We look forward to seeting you even if you use our services for the first time.if you have any questions.please feel free to ask us.

inquery.title: Inquery
inquery.content: Please contact us by telephone or visiting our office

bring.title: Bring waste
bring.content: You can bring waste to us during business hours on weekdays and Saturdays

weight.title: Weight waste
weight.content: After unloading,we weight the waste again

payment.title: Payment
payment.content: we calculate price based on the weight

export.title: Export
export.content: We have gradually increased the amount of export and import of scrap and are exporting to 5bases(China,South Korea,Africa,Thailand,Malaysia).Wehave a deep connection with various selling,buying,and export routes inside and outside Japan.ThereFore,we can engage in all buisiness such as buying scarp an exporting by outselves.We alse offer import and export services.

takeApart.title: Take Apart
takeApart.content: We need to take apart and sort waste for each metal to recycle.We produce each recycled raw ,aterial,actively fpcusing on recycling.for remaining a sustainable socieaty to th next generations

recycle.title: buy
recycle.content: Even though we recaim and incinerate waste in Japan,just by sorting and dismanting it,there are wags to put sparkle into it in other countries.We hope to utilize the limited sources in new palaces again.We alse hope to support a circulating society not only in Japan,but alse in the world
